explanation: The objects involved in completing the task of putting heated slice apple and cooked apple piece in the trash bin are the apples and the plate where the apples were placed. The vase, potato, credit card, cellphone, butterknife, fork, cup, tomato, soap bottle, bowl, pepper shaker, lettuce, bread, mug, statue, glass bottle, knife, pan, spatula, paper towel roll, egg, salt shaker, dish sponge, spoon, and mug are not relevant to this task.
